TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CGAffineTransform extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: 2D Affine transformation used to convert between coordinate spaces.

remarks.para: An affine transformation uses a matrix to transform poitns between coordinate spaces.
These transformation can be used to rotate, scale, shear and translate points and rectangles from one coordinate system into another.

MemberSignature.Value: public CGAffineTransform (float xx, float yx, float xy, float yy, float x0, float y0);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float32 xx, float32 yx, float32 xy, float32 yy, float32 x0, float32 y0) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes an affine transformation from the matrix values.

remarks.para: Defines an affine transformation matrix with the following components:
The third column always has the values 0, 0, 1 so only six values need to be provided.

MemberSignature.Value: public static MonoMac.CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform CGAffineTransformInvert (MonoMac.CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform t);

.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("/System/Library/Frameworks/ApplicationServices.framework/Versions/A/Frameworks/CoreGraphics.framework/CoreGraphics" as "CGAffineTransformInvert" winapi)valuetype MonoMac.CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform CGAffineTransformInvert(valuetype MonoMac.CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform t) cil managed

Docs.summary: Inverts the affine transformation matrix.
Docs.returns: If the affine transformation can not be inverted, the same matrix is returned.
Docs.remarks: You can use the inversion matrix to map points in the target coordinate space that had been mapped to the original coordinate space.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Drawing.RectangleF CGRectApplyAffineTransform (System.Drawing.RectangleF rect, MonoMac.CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform t);

.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("/System/Library/Frameworks/ApplicationServices.framework/Versions/A/Frameworks/CoreGraphics.framework/CoreGraphics" as "CGRectApplyAffineTransform" winapi)valuetype System.Drawing.RectangleF CGRectApplyAffineTransform(valuetype System.Drawing.RectangleF rect, valuetype MonoMac.CoreGraphics.CGAffineTransform t) cil managed

Docs.param: The affine transformation to apply to the points in the rectangle.
Docs.summary: Applies an affine transformation to a rectangle.
Docs.returns: A rectangle whose coordinates have been transformed to the space determined by the affine.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Drawing.PointF TransformPoint (System.Drawing.PointF point);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Drawing.PointF TransformPoint(valuetype System.Drawing.PointF point) cil managed

Docs.summary: Transforms the coordinates of the provided point by the affine.
Docs.returns: The point translated to the new coordinate space.

remarks.para: The point defined by x, y is transformed like this:
new_x = xx * x + xy * y + x0;
new_y = yx * x + yy * y + y0;
